name: Greater Blighted Critical

sections.body: Whenever you confirm a critical hit with a touch spell, ranged touch spell, or spell-like ability against an opponent, the victim gains a random major spellblight.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
sections.name: Special

description: Your critical hit from a spell or spell-like ability afflicts the target with a major spellblight.
